005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ICollectionValue;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.IArrayItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
018
019import java.util.Collection;
020import java.util.List;
021import java.util.stream.Collectors;
022
023import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
024
025/**
026 * Implements the XPath 3.1 <a href=
027 * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-join">array:join</a>
028 * function.
029 */
030public final class ArrayJoin {
031  private static final String NAME = "join";
032  @NonNull
033  static final IFunction SIGNATURE = IFunction.builder()
034      .name(NAME)
035      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS_ARRAY)
036      .deterministic()
037      .contextIndependent()
038      .focusIndependent()
039      .argument(IArgument.builder()
040          .name("array")
041          .type(IArrayItem.class)
042          .zeroOrMore()
043          .build())
044      .returnType(IItem.class)
045      .returnZeroOrOne()
046      .functionHandler(ArrayJoin::execute)
047      .build();
048
049  private ArrayJoin() {
050    // disable construction
051  }
052
053  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
054  @NonNull
055  private static <T extends ICollectionValue> ISequence<? extends IArrayItem<T>> execute(@NonNull IFunction function,
056      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
057      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
058      IItem focus) {
059    ISequence<? extends IArrayItem<T>> arrays = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(0)));
060
061    return join(arrays).asSequence();
062  }
063
064  /**
065   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
066   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-join">array:join</a>.
067   *
068   * @param <T>
069   *          the type of items in the given Metapath array
070   * @param arrays
071   *          the arrays to join
072   * @return a new combined array
073   */
074  @NonNull
075  public static <T extends ICollectionValue> IArrayItem<T> join(
076      @NonNull Collection<? extends IArrayItem<T>> arrays) {
077    return IArrayItem.ofCollection(ObjectUtils.notNull(arrays.stream()
078        .flatMap(Collection::stream)
079        .collect(Collectors.toList())));
080  }
081}
